title: Introducing: Rivka
content: Rivka is a Pittsburgh based electronic band headed up by Reggie Wilkins and Rivka Rose. The rules of the game at first glace seem simple; washed out electronics, dream like vocals and blissful synths all form something that on paper, weâ€™ve all heard before. But they have so much more; dramatic shifts in tone, dark and souring synth work and ultimately great song writing take this little group into a privileged position. Their debut release has been out for a little over a month now. Download it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
